title: 8/28/07 Alubuquerque NM Complete Workshop
description:
CD ONE

8:00 Your every preference forms your Vibrational Escrow. 6:00 Creation through action is, at best, mediocre. 7:00 Your natural inclination is to feel good. 4:00 Beating the drum of not enough money? 4:30 Source, within, knows where to guide you. 5:00 Understanding the Astonishing Power of Your Emotions. 2:40 How would Vibrational Escrow relate to karma? 4:11 To augment his teachings of ?right action?? 7:26 Why has Abraham become available to us? 5:32 What?s it like to be an Abraham? 3:00 The power of the ?Power of Emotions? book?

CD TWO

22:46 Helping veterans and their post-traumatic disorder? 15:10 Should we seek the cause of discord? 7:00 Why would Source create a painful Earth? 8:00 How could she not hear Source?s call? 8:00 Is it really ?wasteful? to over-buy groceries? 1:32 He questions further his future Nonphysical experience.

CD THREE

11:22 Are there ?edges? beyond his leading edge? 3:20 What is the relationship of Abraham to Esther? 23:40 How to turn illness back to wellness? 9:10 Biker wants to feel her sexuality again. 16:00 He explains his emotional control scenarios.

CD FOUR

9:00 Her guided meditation experience was extremely shocking. 13:30 How did the Life Experience get started? 10:34 What?s the difference between feelings and emotions? 25:40 There?s a dam in this musician?s river. 6:20 Abraham closes the Albuquerque NM Workshop.
